description: Recursively load files from a directory.

path.info: Path to the directory to load files from. Defaults to current directory ('.')

types.info: File types to load. Select one or more types or leave empty to load all supported types.

load_hidden.info: If true, hidden files will be loaded.

recursive.info: If true, the search will be recursive.

silent_errors.info: If true, errors will not raise an exception.

use_multithreading.info: If true, multithreading will be used.

errors.invalid_file_types: Invalid file types specified: {invalid_types}. Valid types are: {valid_types}
